title: FOUND IT:  Need a T206 HOFer w/ Sweet Cap 350, 25 back
author: David R

posts.post_title: FOUND IT:  Need a T206 HOFer w/ Sweet Cap 350, 25 back
posts.post_content:
I am completing my run of all backs with a HOFer on the front (I have 32 different backs) but this relatively common one has alluded me. Does anyone have a HOFer graded 2-4 with this back that they can sell or trade?  Please email or PM. 
Thanks,
David R
